name: Sprigatito
desc: Sprigatito is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its cute and leafy appearance.

name: Floragato
desc: Floragato is the evolved form of Sprigatito. It continues to be a Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Meowscarada
desc: Meowscarada is a dual-type Grass/Dark Pokémon known for its mysterious and masquerade-like appearance.

name: Fuecoco
desc: Fuecoco is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery and coconut-inspired design.

name: Crocalor
desc: Crocalor is the evolved form of Fuecoco. It continues to be a Fire-type Pokémon.

name: Skeledirge
desc: Skeledirge is a unique dual-type Fire/Ghost Pokémon with a skeletal and eerie appearance.

name: Quaxly
desc: Quaxly is a Water-type Pokémon known for its duck-like appearance.

name: Quaxwell
desc: Quaxwell is the evolved form of Quaxly. It continues to be a Water-type Pokémon.

name: Quaquaval
desc: Quaquaval is a dual-type Water/Fighting Pokémon known for its martial arts skills.

name: Lechonk
desc: Lechonk is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its chubby and playful appearance.

name: Oinkologne
desc: Oinkologne is the evolved form of Lechonk. It continues to be a Normal-type Pokémon.

name: Tarountula
desc: Tarountula is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its tarantula-like appearance.

name: Spidops
desc: Spidops is the evolved form of Tarountula. It continues to be a Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Nymble
desc: Nymble is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its nimble and agile movements.

name: Lokix
desc: Lokix is a dual-type Bug/Dark Pokémon with a mischievous and mysterious demeanor.

name: Hoppip
desc: Hoppip is a dual-type Grass/Flying Pokémon known for its lightweight and floating ability.

name: Skiploom
desc: Skiploom is the evolved form of Hoppip. It continues to be a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon.

name: Jumpluff
desc: Jumpluff is the final evolution of Hoppip. It's a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon known for its cotton-like seeds.

name: Fletchling
desc: Fletchling is a dual-type Normal/Flying Pokémon known for its small size and chirping voice.

name: Fletchinder
desc: Fletchinder is the evolved form of Fletchling. It becomes a dual-type Fire/Flying Pokémon.

name: Talonflame
desc: Talonflame is the final evolution of Fletchling. It's a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon known for its speed and fiery wings.

name: Pawmi
desc: Pawmi is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its paw-like appearance and static electricity.

name: Pawmo
desc: Pawmo is the evolved form of Pawmi. It becomes a dual-type Electric/Fighting Pokémon.

name: Pawmot
desc: Pawmot is the final evolution of Pawmi. It's a dual-type Electric/Fighting Pokémon known for its powerful punches.

name: Houndour
desc: Houndour is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokémon. It is not fully evolved (NFE).

name: Houndoom
desc: Houndoom is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon. It is not fully evolved (NFE). Pikachu also has a variant form called Pikachu with a Hat, which is an Electric-type Pokémon with the sprite suffix 'hat'.

name: Oricorio
desc: Oricorio is a Fire/Flying type Pokémon. It has multiple forms, including a Fire/Flying type with a pom-pom, an Electric/Flying type with a pom-pom, a Psychic/Flying type with a pau, and a Ghost/Flying type with a sensu.

desc: Mareep is an Electric type Pokémon. It is not fully evolved.

desc: Basculin is a Water type Pokémon. It has multiple forms, including a regular Water type, a blue-striped Water type, and a white-striped Water type.

name: Gulpin
desc: Gulpin is a Poison type Pokémon. It is not fully evolved.

name: Swalot
desc: Swalot is a Poison type Pokémon.

name: Florges
desc: Florges is a Fairy type Pokémon. It has multiple forms with different sprite suffixes.

name: Diglett
desc: Diglett is a Ground type Pokémon. It is not fully evolved.

name: Dugtrio
desc: A set of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Torkoal
desc: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

name: Numel
desc: It has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body.

name: Camerupt
desc: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. If this Pokémon becomes angry, the magma cools and hardens. In its cooled state, it forms...

name: Bronzor
desc: There is some debate about the origin of Bronzor. The foundation of many theories is that this Pokémon was first created as a guardian of ancient people by drawing a baneful pattern on it.

name: Bronzong
desc: One caused it to become a ferocious Pokémon that loves to battle, and the other caused it to become a more docile Pokémon that loves to eat.

name: Axew
desc: They nest in the ground and use their tusks to crush hard berries. Crushing berries is also how they test each other's strength.

name: Fraxure
desc: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Haxorus
desc: The tusks that grow on its cheeks are more vulnerable than the ones on its jaws. It constantly sharpens its tusks.

name: Mankey
desc: When Mankey starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign that it is becoming angry. However, because it goes into a towering rage almost instantly, it is impossible for anyone to flee its wrath.

name: Primeape
desc: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

name: Annihilape
desc: Annihilape is known for its incredible anger and aggression. It is said that this Pokémon's spirit embodies intense rage and vengeful thoughts. Approach with caution.

name: Meditite
desc: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result, it has developed tremendous psychic powers.

name: Medicham
desc: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed psychic powers. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power.

name: Riolu
desc: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves. Riolu communicates with others by using the aura waves that are emitted from its body.

name: Lucario
desc: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

name: Charcadet
desc: It is known for its small, candle-like flame. Charcadet's flame is often mistaken for a real candle, and it has been known to start fires accidentally.

name: Armarouge
desc: It disguises itself as a fire hydrant and tricks people into believing it is a real one. It is known for its mischievous behavior.

name: Ceruledge
desc: Ceruledge is said to be the embodiment of a vengeful spirit. It haunts old buildings and ruins, seeking revenge on those who wronged it in the past.

name: Barboach
desc: Barboach uses its whiskers to sense its surroundings in muddy water. It is known to be a very patient and calm Pokémon.

name: Whiscash
desc: Whiscash is known to cause earthquakes by thrashing about. It is said that they announce the coming of earthquakes by leaping out of the water.

name: Tadbulb
desc: Tadbulb generates electricity in the small bulbs on its body. It uses this electricity to communicate with others of its kind and to illuminate dark places.

name: Bellibolt
desc: Bellibolt has a special membrane on its belly that it can stretch and vibrate to produce a sound that can paralyze its enemies.

name: Goomy
desc: Goomy is capable of soaking up water and expanding. This ability allows it to bounce around like a ball.

name: Sliggoo
desc: Sliggoo's horns are very sensitive to temperature changes. When it is about to evolve, they become hot and tingly.

name: Goodra
desc: Goodra is known for its slimy body. It leaves gooey footprints wherever it goes, and it is often considered a nuisance for this reason.

name: Croagunk
desc: Croagunk has poison sacs in its cheeks. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Toxicroak
desc: Toxicroak is a master of precision punches and kicks. Its poison sacs become more concentrated when it is angered.

name: Wattrel
desc: Wattrel generates electricity when it flies at high speeds. It can discharge this electricity as powerful electric shocks.

name: Kilowattrel
desc: Kilowattrel is known for its electrifying speed. It can fly at supersonic speeds, leaving a trail of electric sparks in its wake.

name: Eevee
desc: Eevee is a unique Pokémon that is capable of evolving into several different forms, depending on its environment and friendship with its trainer.

name: Vaporeon
desc: Vaporeon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It can melt into water and vanish.

name: Jolteon
desc: Jolteon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It has the ability to absorb electricity from the air.

name: Flareon
desc: Flareon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It has the ability to generate intense heat.

name: Espeon
desc: Espeon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is highly attuned to the emotions of others.

name: Umbreon
desc: Umbreon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is known for its ability to ward off evil spirits.

name: Leafeon
desc: Leafeon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is closely connected to nature and can cause plants to bloom instantly.

name: Glaceon
desc: Glaceon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It has the ability to freeze moisture in the air, creating ice crystals.

name: Sylveon
desc: Sylveon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It emits soothing and healing auras.

name: Dunsparce
desc: Dunsparce is a serpent-like Pokémon that can glide through the air by flapping its wings.

name: Tauros
desc: Tauros is a powerful Normal-type Pokémon known for its charging behavior.

name: Litleo
desc: Litleo is a Fire/Normal-type Pokémon often resembling a lion cub.

name: Pyroar
desc: Pyroar is an elegant Fire/Normal-type Pokémon known for its majestic appearance.

name: Stunky
desc: Stunky is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon with a distinctive skunk-like appearance.

name: Skuntank
desc: Skuntank is the evolved form of Stunky, known for its foul odor and Poison/Dark typing.

name: Zorua
desc: Zorua is a mischievous Dark-type Pokémon often using its illusion abilities.

name: Zoroark
desc: Zoroark is a master of illusions and can transform into other Pokémon.

name: Sneasel
desc: Sneasel is a Dark/Ice-type Pokémon known for its sharp claws and cunning nature.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is the evolved form of Sneasel, prized for its speed and ferocity.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon associated with omens and mysteries.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is the evolved form of Murkrow, often seen as a mob boss of the skies.

name: Gothita
desc: Gothita is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its gothic appearance and powers.

name: Gothorita
desc: Gothorita is the evolved form of Gothita, possessing strong psychic abilities.

name: Gothitelle
desc: Gothitelle is the final form of Gothita, known for its psychic powers and elegant demeanor.

name: Sinistea
desc: Sinistea is a Ghost-type Pokémon often found in antique teacups.

name: Polteageist
desc: Polteageist is the evolved form of Sinistea, inhabiting teapots and causing mischief.

name: Mimikyu
desc: Mimikyu is a Ghost/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its shy and hidden appearance.

name: Klefki
desc: Klefki is a Steel/Fairy-type Pokémon often associated with keys.

name: Indeedee
desc: Indeedee is a Psychic/Normal-type Pokémon known for its supportive abilities.

name: Bramblin
desc: Bramblin is a Grass/Ghost-type Pokémon often found in overgrown areas.

name: Brambleghast
desc: Brambleghast is the evolved form of Bramblin, known for its eerie presence.

name: Toedscool
desc: Toedscool is a Ground/Grass-type Pokémon often seen near water sources.

name: Toedscruel
desc: Toedscruel is the evolved form of Toedscool, known for its territorial behavior.

name: Tropius
desc: Tropius is a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon often seen flying with its banana-like wings.

name: Fomantis
desc: Fomantis is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its bright green appearance.

name: Lurantis
desc: Lurantis is the evolved form of Fomantis, prized for its graceful and powerful nature.

name: Klawf
desc: Klawf is a Rock-type Pokémon known for its sharp claws and rugged appearance.

name: Capsakid
desc: Capsakid is a Grass-type Pokémon often found in gardens and fields.

name: Scovillain
desc: Scovillain is a Grass/Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery and adventurous spirit.

name: Cacnea
desc: Cacnea is a Grass-type Pokémon with sharp spikes and a desert-dwelling nature.

name: Cacturne
desc: Cacturne is the evolved form of Cacnea, often seen in arid environments.

name: Rellor
desc: Rellor is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its quick movements and agility.

name: Rabsca
desc: Rabsca is a Bug/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its psychic abilities and vibrant colors.

name: Venonat
desc: Venonat is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its large compound eyes.

name: Venomoth
desc: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat, often seen in moonlit nights.

name: Pineco
desc: Pineco is a Bug-type Pokémon often found clinging to trees and emitting a sweet scent.

name: Forretress
desc: Forretress is the evolved form of Pineco, known for its sturdy steel shell.

name: Scyther
desc: Scyther is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its lightning-fast speed and scythes for hands.

name: Scizor
desc: Scizor is the evolved form of Scyther, often seen as a formidable Steel-type Pokémon.

name: Heracross
desc: Heracross is a Bug/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its strength and determination.

name: Flittle
desc: Flittle is a Psychic-type Pokémon often seen floating gracefully.

name: Espathra
desc: Espathra is the evolved form of Flittle, known for its psychic abilities and elegance.

name: Hippopotas
desc: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its sandy appearances and digging habits.

name: Hippowdon
desc: Hippowdon is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its immense size and the ability to create sandstorms.

name: Sandile
desc: Sandile is a Ground/Dark-type Pokémon often found in arid environments and known for its cunning nature.

name: Krokorok
desc: Krokorok is the evolved form of Sandile, recognized for its keen senses and sharp teeth.

name: Krookodile
desc: Krookodile is the final evolution of Sandile, a powerful Ground/Dark-type known for its intimidating presence.

name: Silicobra
desc: Silicobra is a Ground-type Pokémon often found in desert regions, known for its burrowing ability.

name: Sandaconda
desc: Sandaconda is the evolved form of Silicobra, recognized for its massive size and sand manipulation skills.

name: Mudbray
desc: Mudbray is a Ground-type Pokémon often seen working hard, known for its determination and strength.

name: Mudsdale
desc: Mudsdale is the evolved form of Mudbray, a robust Ground-type Pokémon used for heavy labor.

name: Larvesta
desc: Larvesta is a Bug/Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery appearance and potential to evolve into a majestic creature.

name: Volcarona
desc: Volcarona is the evolved form of Larvesta, a majestic Bug/Fire-type known for its graceful and fiery nature.

name: Bagon
desc: Bagon is a Dragon-type Pokémon with a strong desire to fly and evolve into a formidable dragon.

name: Shelgon
desc: Shelgon is the evolved form of Bagon, recognized for its protective shell and determination.

name: Salamence
desc: Salamence is the final evolution of Bagon, a fearsome Dragon/Flying-type known for its speed and power.

name: Tinkatink
desc: Tinkatink is a Fairy/Steel-type Pokémon known for its tiny stature and sparkling appearance.

name: Tinkatuff
desc: Tinkatuff is the evolved form of Tinkatink, a Fairy/Steel-type known for its defensive abilities.

name: Tinkaton
desc: Tinkaton is the final evolution of Tinkatink, a Fairy/Steel-type known for its majestic and regal appearance.

name: Hatenna
desc: Hatenna is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its psychic abilities and hat-like growth on its head.

name: Hattrem
desc: Hattrem is the evolved form of Hatenna, known for its increased psychic powers and calm demeanor.

name: Hatterene
desc: Hatterene is the final evolution of Hatenna, a Psychic/Fairy-type known for its mystical and elegant appearance.

name: Impidimp
desc: Impidimp is a Dark/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its mischievous and playful behavior.

name: Morgrem
desc: Morgrem is the evolved form of Impidimp, often seen causing pranks and chaos.

name: Grimmsnarl
desc: Grimmsnarl is the final evolution of Impidimp, a formidable Dark/Fairy-type known for its menacing appearance.

name: Wiglett
desc: Wiglett is a Water-type Pokémon known for its small size and playful nature.

name: Wugtrio
desc: Wugtrio is the evolved form of Wiglett, a Water-type Pokémon recognized for its teamwork and cooperation.

name: Bombirdier
desc: Bombirdier is a Flying/Dark-type Pokémon known for its explosive personality and aerial acrobatics.

name: Finizen
desc: Finizen is a Water-type Pokémon known for its elegance and fin-like appendages.

name: Palafin
desc: Palafin is a Water-type Pokémon known for its grace in water. Its Hero form is legendary for its heroic deeds.

name: Varoom
desc: Varoom is a Steel/Poison-type Pokémon known for its speedy nature and toxic abilities.

name: Revavroom
desc: A metallic and poisonous Pokémon known for its powerful attacks.

name: Cyclizar
desc: A mystical dragon-like creature with the ability to manipulate elements.

name: Orthworm
desc: A tough and sturdy Pokémon known for its resilience in battles.

name: Sableye
desc: A mischievous Pokémon that dwells in dark places and plays pranks on travelers.

name: Shuppet
desc: A ghostly Pokémon that likes to hide in shadows and surprise unsuspecting victims.

name: Banette
desc: An eerie and vengeful Pokémon that was once a discarded doll brought to life.

name: Falinks
desc: A disciplined group of fighting Pokémon that march in formation and fight as one.

name: Hawlucha
desc: A high-flying acrobatic Pokémon that combines fighting skills with graceful moves.

name: Spiritomb
desc: A mysterious Pokémon formed from 108 spirits, each bound to a stone.

name: Noibat
desc: A small and curious Pokémon with the potential to become a mighty dragon.

name: Noivern
desc: A fearsome dragon Pokémon known for its supersonic sound attacks.

name: Dreepy
desc: A timid and ghostly Pokémon that evolves into a powerful dragon.

name: Drakloak
desc: An elusive and stealthy Pokémon that hides in the shadows.

name: Dragapult
desc: A jet-propelled dragon that launches itself at high speeds to attack.

name: Glimmet
desc: A rock and poison Pokémon known for its dazzling appearance and toxic abilities.

name: Glimmora
desc: A mysterious rock and poison Pokémon that dwells in caves and emits a faint glow.

forms.name: Rotom
forms.desc: A mischievous electric ghost Pokémon that can possess various appliances.

forms.name: Rotom Fan
forms.desc: A fan-like electric ghost Pokémon that brings breezy winds.

forms.name: Rotom Frost
forms.desc: A chilly electric ghost Pokémon that freezes its surroundings.

forms.name: Rotom Heat
forms.desc: A fiery electric ghost Pokémon that can turn up the heat.

forms.name: Rotom Mow
forms.desc: A grassy electric ghost Pokémon with a green thumb.

forms.name: Rotom Wash
forms.desc: A water-loving electric ghost Pokémon that keeps things clean.

name: Greavard
desc: A solemn ghost Pokémon that roams ancient ruins and protects them.

name: Houndstone
desc: A phantom hound Pokémon that is said to guard the gates to the underworld.

name: Oranguru
desc: A wise and scholarly Pokémon that possesses great knowledge and psychic powers.

name: Passimian
desc: A tribal and teamwork-oriented Pokémon that excels in cooperative battles.

name: Komala
desc: A drowsy and perpetually sleeping Pokémon that battles while asleep.

name: Larvitar
desc: A rock and ground Pokémon known for its rugged nature and potential for evolution.

name: Pupitar
desc: A pupal Pokémon that undergoes metamorphosis to become a powerful rock monster.

name: Tyranitar
desc: A colossal and fearsome Pokémon that can cause earthquakes with its movements.

name: Stonjourner
desc: A massive and ancient stone Pokémon that stands as a guardian of history.

name: Eiscue
desc: A mysterious ice Pokémon that can change its appearance with the flip of its ice cube head.

name: Pincurchin
desc: A spiky and electrifying Pokémon known for its thorny defenses.

name: Sandygast
desc: A ghostly sand Pokémon that traps unsuspecting prey beneath its sandy surface.

name: Palossand
desc: An ancient and haunted sandcastle Pokémon that commands the power of the desert.

name: Slowpoke
desc: A slow-witted yet friendly water and psychic Pokémon often found near water bodies.

name: Slowbro
desc: A water and psychic Pokémon that forms a symbiotic relationship with a sheltering Shellder.

name: Slowking
desc: A regal water and psychic Pokémon known for its intelligence and leadership abilities.

name: Shellos
desc: A blob-like water Pokémon with different forms depending on its habitat.

name: Gastrodon
desc: A water and ground Pokémon with different forms based on its habitat, known for its adaptability.

name: Shellder
desc: A clam-like water Pokémon that latches onto Slowpoke to evolve into Slowbro.

name: Cloyster
desc: A well-armored water and ice Pokémon with a powerful defense mechanism.

name: Qwilfish
desc: A water and poison Pokémon known for its ability to inflate its body with water.

name: Luvdisc
desc: A heart-shaped water Pokémon often associated with love and affection.

name: Finneon
desc: A small and colorful water Pokémon often found in schools swimming gracefully.

name: Lumineon
desc: A graceful and elegant water Pokémon that moves with beauty and grace.

name: Bruxish
desc: A brightly colored water and psychic Pokémon known for its vibrant appearance.

name: Alomomola
desc: A caring and nurturing water Pokémon often seen as a protector of injured Pokémon.

name: Skrelp
desc: A small and toxic water Pokémon with the potential to become a formidable dragon.

name: Dragalge
desc: A venomous and draconic Pokémon with a unique typing.

name: Clauncher
desc: A crab-like water Pokémon known for its powerful claw attacks.

name: Clawitzer
desc: A powerful and cannon-wielding water Pokémon known for its precision.

name: Tynamo
desc: A tiny electric Pokémon that generates electrical energy.

name: Eelektrik
desc: An electric Pokémon that uses its tail to make contact with electrical outlets.

name: Eelektross
desc: A versatile electric Pokémon that can levitate and lacks traditional weaknesses.

name: Mareanie
desc: A venomous water and poison Pokémon often found near coral reefs.

name: Toxapex
desc: A highly toxic and defensive water and poison Pokémon known for its sharp spikes.

desc: A vibrant and flamboyant bird Pokémon known for its graceful yet powerful moves.

desc: A serpentine dragon Pokémon with a gentle disposition.

desc: An elegant dragon Pokémon that glides through the air with grace.

desc: A powerful and friendly dragon Pokémon known for its ability to fly at incredible speeds.
